:root{--pixel-size:2px;--grid-cell:calc(var(--pixel-size)*16);background-position:50%;background-image:url(https://i.pinimg.com/originals/e8/99/f8/e899f8cc9ee082c8743abdfe7d66fa5b.gif);background-size:100%;background-repeat:no-repeat}@media(min-width:700px){:root{--pixel-size:3px}}@media(min-width:1000px){:root{--pixel-size:4px}}body,html{height:100%}body{background:var(--bg);display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.pixel-art{-ms-interpolation-mode:nearest-neighbor;image-rendering:-moz-crisp-edges;image-rendering:pixelated}.modal-screen-one{position:fixed;width:100%;height:100%;background-image:url(https://66.media.tumblr.com/ba1e5fe0677195784bd5037de7b959cd/tumblr_p4rutuhshj1x4kppqo1_500.gif);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;background-size:100%;display:none}.modal-screen-one.visible{display:block;animation:fade-slide-in .3s ease-out
